task.title: Quick Start
task.shortdesc: Get started quickly with a minimal configuration to build HTML5 documentation.

context.p: This quick start guide shows you how to build your first DITA documentation output in just a few steps.

step.cmd: Create your build.gradle.kts with minimal configuration:
Create your DITA map at src/dita/maps/user-guide.ditamap
Download DITA-OT and build your documentation:
Open the generated output in your browser:

info.p: Navigate to build/docs/html5/ and open the HTML file.

result.p: Your HTML5 documentation is generated in the build/docs/html5 directory.
For more output formats and advanced configuration, see and .
